title: Getting Started - Stencil
hypertext: Stencil requires a recent LTS version of
and npm. Make sure you've installed and/or updated Node before continuing.
Note that you will need to use npm 6 or higher.

Stencil can be used to create standalone components, or entire apps. After running init
you will be provided with a prompt so that you can choose the type of project to start.

? Pick a starter › - Use arrow-keys. Return to submit.

❯  ionic-pwa     Everything you need to build fast, production ready PWAs
   app           Minimal starter

building a Stencil app or website
   component     Collection of web components that can be used anywhere
